thread.title: RUBEN

author: RUBEN
title: RUBEN
text:
I selected what was best recommended by the site for my region. Further review through other eductional and agriculture sources seemed to correspond with the sites suggestions, ultimately you make your best selection based on your knowledge or experience. I did request a change and it honored without hesitation. If you did your homework and make a discerning choice, then with a bit of care, you should do well.
I am quite hopeful and expectant.
Ruben
